name: Python Fundamentals - Variables and Data Types
description: Introduction to Python basics: variables, data types, operators, and basic syntax. We'll cover string manipulation, numbers, booleans, and type conversion.

name: 1:1 Learning Path Discussion with Sarah
description: Personal mentoring session to discuss your learning progress and adjust the curriculum based on your goals.

name: Control Flow and Functions
description: Deep dive into Python control structures: if statements, loops, and function definitions. Learn about parameters, return values, and scope.

name: Workshop: Building a Command Line Tool
description: Hands-on workshop where we'll build a practical command-line tool using Python. Learn about argparse, file handling, and best practices.

name: Data Structures Deep Dive
description: Comprehensive look at Python's core data structures: lists, tuples, dictionaries, and sets. Understanding when to use each type.

name: 1:1 Code Review with Michael
description: Individual code review session focusing on your recent assignments and projects. Get personalized feedback and improvement suggestions.

name: Object-Oriented Programming Basics
description: Introduction to OOP concepts in Python: classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism. Learn how to structure your code using object-oriented principles.

name: Workshop: Testing in Python
description: Practical workshop on writing tests in Python using pytest. Cover unit testing, fixtures, and test-driven development principles.

name: 1:1 Career Strategy with Lisa
description: Career development session focusing on your professional goals, portfolio development, and job search strategy.

name: Web Development with Flask
description: Introduction to web development using Flask framework. Learn about routes, templates, and handling HTTP requests.

name: Workshop: Building REST APIs
description: Hands-on session building RESTful APIs with Flask. Cover API design, authentication, and best practices.

name: Database Integration with SQLAlchemy
description: Learn how to work with databases in Python using SQLAlchemy ORM. Cover database design, queries, and relationships.

name: 1:1 Project Planning with David
description: Discussion about your capstone project. Review architecture, requirements, and implementation strategy.

name: Advanced Python Features
description: Deep dive into advanced Python features: decorators, generators, context managers, and metaclasses.

name: Workshop: Docker for Python Applications
description: Learn how to containerize Python applications using Docker. Cover Docker basics, docker-compose, and deployment strategies.
